Title: Establishes a carbon farming tax credit for farmers
Summary: Establishes the carbon farming certification committee for the purpose of developing a certification framework, determining qualified carbon removal practices eligible for the carbon farming tax credit, and promulgating certification standards for qualified carbon removal practices; provides for the development of educational materials to encourage carbon farming by promoting farming practices which reduce, sequester and mitigate greenhouse gas emissions on land used in support of a farm operation; establishes carbon farming tax credits.
LawCode: Amd §150, add Art 11-C §§151-p - 151-t, Ag & Mkts L; amd §§210-B & 606, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law and the tax law, in relation to enacting the carbon farming act
